section.title: Present Simple with adverbs of frequency
section.sectiontitle: Use adverbs of frequency (always, usually, often, sometimes, hardly ever, never) with the Present Simple to say how often something happens.
section.text2: I start work at nine o'clock.
section.text2a: I always start work at nine o'clock.
section.sectiontitle2: Put adverbs of frequency after the verb be but before other main verbs.
section.text3a: The train is usually late.
section.text4a: The train usually arrives on time.
